Text: FYI the picturehost dosn't show any pics when i click the link
this picture host doesn't work for me either - it never shows any screenshots on my pc
using firefox 3.5.5 doesn't show the screens but in konquerer the image host works fine...

DM(DK):  I always have problems with that photomaze site.  What I figured out is that if you replace the string "?v=" in the URL with "images", the image will pop right up.  So, photomaze.net/?v=blonde... becomes photomaze.net/images/blonde...  Give it a try, it should work.
